metadata.title: German prosecutors charge Russian with planning attack on Israeli embassy in Berlin

left: German prosecutors filed terrorism charges against a man identified as Akhmad E., who is suspected of planning an attack on the Israeli Embassy in Berlin.
Akhmad E. was arrested on Feb. 20 at the airport while preparing to board a flight out of Berlin.
He is accused of supporting a foreign terrorist organization and preparing a serious act of violence.
He reportedly sent a video declaring loyalty to the Islamic State group shortly before his departure.
center: German prosecutors filed terrorism charges against a man identified as Akhmad E., who is suspected of planning an attack on the Israeli Embassy in Berlin.
Akhmad E. was arrested on Feb. 20 at the airport while preparing to board a flight out of Berlin.
He is accused of supporting a foreign terrorist organization and preparing a serious act of violence.
He reportedly sent a video declaring loyalty to the Islamic State group shortly before his departure.
right: German prosecutors filed terrorism charges against a man identified as Akhmad E., who is suspected of planning an attack on the Israeli Embassy in Berlin.
Akhmad E. was arrested on Feb. 20 at the airport while preparing to board a flight out of Berlin.
He is accused of supporting a foreign terrorist organization and preparing a serious act of violence.
He reportedly sent a video declaring loyalty to the Islamic State group shortly before his departure.
